answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Carol – I hope the document attached and the links below are useful:
Attached – Culpeper County, VA - INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ASSESSMENT & CONSULTANT SERVICES
Church Falls, VA – Information Technology Assessment Services RFP
http://www.fallschurchva.gov/Content/Government/Departments/AdminServ/RFP1201-10-ITA_ITAssesSvc12610.pdf 
Scott County, IA - Technology Assessment and Strategic Plan RFP
http://www2.scottcountyiowa.com/fss/pub/bids/2009/20090908_Technology_Assessment/Scott%20County%20Iowa%20Technology%20Assessment%20RFP%202009.pdf 
St. Cloud, MN - Technology Audit Assessment - Housing and Redevelopment Authority 
http://www.stcloudhra.com/RFP%20-%20Technology%20Audit_01.pdf 
INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY ASSESSMENT AND RECOMMENDATIONS
http://www.osdchi.com/RFP/IT%20Assessment%20RFP.pdf 
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Carol – attached is an RFP from Santa Barbara, CA for “Evaluation of Information Technology Systems and Organization”.  I’ll send one more email with a copy of awardees RFP reply (can only attach 1 doc at a time).  Also, the consultant said he provided the city with an 18-page summary report at the close of the project that if you’re interested he’ll ask Santa Barbara for approval to share it with you.
Feel welcome to contact the awardee direct at: 
Clancy Priest
Priest Consulting 
clancy@priest.com
925.452.7130

author: Carol Mathewson
text:
The City of Tacoma, WA will be issuing an RFP in early 2013 to engage a consulting firm to review IT services: specifically, future state of ERP (SAP) and Data Centers; generally, technologies in use, service model, cost for service, staffing model.  
If you have an RFP you could share, it would be most appreciated.  
Thank you.
Carol Mathewson
carol.mathewson@cityoftacoma.org
253.594.7997
title: In need of RFP examples for assessing IT services
